text: NGC 432 is a lenticular galaxy of type S0^- located in the constellation Tucana. It was discovered on October 6, 1834 by John Herschel. It was described by Dreyer as "faint, small, round, gradually brighter middle, 12th magnitude star to east." ==References== ==External links== * 0432 18341006 Category:Tucana (constellation) Category:Lenticular galaxies Category:Discoveries by John Herschel
title: NGC 432
